1: -module(hty_inte_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -export([
    4:   all/0, groups/0, 
    5:   init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, 
    6:   init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
    7:   init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
    8: 
    9: -export([accesslog_check_request_logged/1]).
   10: -export([catch_forward/1]).
   11: -export([history_empty/1,
   12:       history_unparsable_body/1,
   13:       history_post_and_reread/1,
   14:       history_get_latest/1,
   15:       history_get_earlier/1,
   16:       history_expect_conflict/1]).
   17: -export([move_file/1,
   18:         move_folder/1]).
   19: -export([static_get_rootfile/1,
   20:         static_get_subfile/1,
   21:         static_index_txt_welcome/1,
   22:         static_get_rootindex/1,
   23:         static_get_subindex/1]).
   24: -export([staticlisting_list_root/1,
   25:         staticlisting_list_sub/1,
   26:         staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile/1]).
   27: -export([vhosts_basic/1,
   28:       vhosts_subdomains/1]).
   29: -export([xslpi_basic/1]).
   30: 
   31: all() -> [
   32:     {group, accesslog},
   33:     {group, 'catch'},
   34:     {group, move},
   35:     {group, history},
   36:     {group, static},
   37:     {group, staticlisting},
   38:     {group, vhosts},
   39:     {group, xslpi}
   40: ].
   41: 
   42: groups() -> [
   43:     {accesslog, [
   44:       accesslog_check_request_logged
   45:     ]},
   46:     {'catch', [
   47:         catch_forward
   48:     ]},
   49:     {history, [
   50:       history_empty,
   51:       history_unparsable_body,
   52:       history_post_and_reread,
   53:       history_get_latest,
   54:       history_get_earlier,
   55:       history_expect_conflict
   56:     ]},
   57:     {move, [
   58:         move_file,
   59:         move_folder
   60:     ]},
   61:     {static, [
   62:         static_get_rootfile,
   63:         static_get_subfile,
   64:         static_index_txt_welcome,
   65:         static_get_rootindex,
   66:         static_get_subindex
   67:     ]},
   68:     {staticlisting, [
   69:         staticlisting_list_root,
   70:         staticlisting_list_sub,
   71:         staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile
   72:     ]},
   73:     {vhosts, [
   74:       vhosts_basic,
   75:       vhosts_subdomains
   76:     ]},
   77:     {xslpi, [
   78:       xslpi_basic
   79:     ]}
   80: ].
   81: 
   82: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   83:     ok = inets:start(),
   84:     Config.
   85: 
   86: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   87:     ok = inets:stop(),
   88:     Config.
   89: 
   90: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   91:     Groupname = atom_to_list(Group),
   92:     Groupdir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config) ++ Groupname,
   93:     Fromdir = Groupdir ++ "/fixture",
   94:     Todir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config) ++ Groupname ++ "/fixture",
   95:     copy_fixture(Fromdir, Todir),
   96:     {ok, _Pid} = hty_main:start([Todir]),
   97:     [{wwwroot, Todir},
   98:      {files_dir, Groupdir ++ "/files"}|Config].
   99: 
  100: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  101:     ok = hty_main:stop(),
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: init_per_testcase(Test, Config) ->
  105:     io:format(user, "About to start httpc with profile ~p~n", [Test]),
  106:     {ok, _} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Test}]),
  107:     [{tc_name, Test}|Config].
  108: 
  109: end_per_testcase(Test, _Config) ->
  110:     %Httpcpid = proplists:get_value(httpc_pid, Config, no_httpc_pid_config),
  111:     ok = inets:stop(httpc, Test).
  112: 
  113: %%% Support
  114: copy_fixture(From, To) ->
  115:     case filelib:is_dir(From) of
  116:         true ->
  117:             filelib:ensure_dir(To),
  118:             file:make_dir(To),
  119:             {ok, Filenames} = file:list_dir(From),
  120:             lists:foreach(fun(Filename) ->
  121:                 copy_fixture(From ++ "/" ++ Filename, To ++ "/" ++ Filename)
  122:             end, Filenames);
  123:         false ->
  124:             ok = filelib:ensure_dir(To),
  125:             io:format("Copying from ~s to ~s", [From, To]),
  126:             {ok, _} = file:copy(From, To)
  127:     end.
  128: 
  129: -record(exchange, {
  130:     method = get,
  131:     req_headers = [],
  132:     req_file = none,
  133:     req_body = none,
  134:     url = no_url,
  135:     status = 200,
  136:     rsp_headers = [],
  137:     rsp_body = no_rsp_body,
  138:     rsp_file = no_rsp_file,
  139:     rsp_pattern = no_rsp_pattern,
  140:     entity_compare = strict :: strict | trimmed
  141: }).
  142: 
  143: run_test(Exchanges, Config) ->
  144:     Testcase = proplists:get_value(tc_name, Config),
  145:     run_test(Testcase, Exchanges, Config).
  146: 
  147: run_test(Test, Exchange, Config) when is_record(Exchange, exchange) ->
  148:   run_test(Test, [Exchange], Config);
  149: run_test(Test, Exchanges, Config) when is_list(Exchanges) ->
  150:     Filesdir = proplists:get_value(files_dir, Config)
  151:       ++ "/" ++ atom_to_list(Test) ++ "/",
  152:     lists:foreach(fun(X) ->
  153:         Request = case {X#exchange.req_file, X#exchange.req_body} of
  154:           {none, none} -> {
  155:               X#exchange.url,
  156:               X#exchange.req_headers
  157:           };
  158:           {Reqfile, none} -> {
  159:               X#exchange.url,
  160:               X#exchange.req_headers,
  161:               proplists:get_value("content-type",
  162:                 X#exchange.req_headers, "application/octet-stream"),
  163:               hty_result:assume_ok(file:read_file(Filesdir ++ Reqfile))
  164:           };
  165:           {none, Reqbody} -> {
  166:             X#exchange.url,
  167:             X#exchange.req_headers,
  168:             proplists:get_value("content-type",
  169:               X#exchange.req_headers, "application/octet-stream"),
  170:             case is_binary(Reqbody) of
  171:               true -> Reqbody;
  172:               false -> list_to_binary(Reqbody)
  173:             end
  174:           };
  175:           {_,_} -> error(dont_specify_both_req_file_and_req_body)
  176:         end,
  177:         {ok, Response} = httpc:request(
  178:             X#exchange.method,
  179:             Request,
  180:             [], % HttpOptions
  181:             [{body_format, binary}], % Options
  182:             Test),
  183:         {{_, Status, StatusMessage}, ResponseHeaders, Body} = Response,
  184:         case X#exchange.status of
  185:             undefined -> ok;
  186:             Status -> ok;
  187:             _ -> notok = io:format("Wrong status [~p ~p]~n", [Status, StatusMessage])
  188:         end,
  189:         lists:foreach(fun({Name, Value}) ->
  190:             io:format("Looking for header ~s=~s in ~p~n", [Name, Value, ResponseHeaders]),
  191:             true = lists:member({Name, Value}, ResponseHeaders)
  192:         end, X#exchange.rsp_headers),
  193: 
  194:         case X#exchange.rsp_pattern of
  195:           no_rsp_pattern -> ok;
  196:           Pattern ->
  197:             case re:compile(Pattern) of
  198:               {ok, Mp} ->
  199:                 case re:run(Body, Mp) of
  200:                   {match, _} -> ok;
  201:                   nomatch ->
  202:                    throw({error, ["Expected match against ", Pattern, " but got ", Body]})
  203:                 end;
  204:               {error, {Error, Pos}} ->
  205:                 throw({error, ["Bad regex", Error, Pos]})
  206:             end
  207:         end,
  208: 
  209:         case X#exchange.rsp_body of
  210:             no_rsp_body -> ok;
  211:             Body -> ok;
  212:             OtherBody ->
  213:               case X#exchange.entity_compare of
  214:                 strict -> 
  215:                   throw({error, ["Expected ", Body, " but got ", OtherBody]});  
  216:                 trimmed -> trim_compare(OtherBody, Body)
  217:               end
  218:         end,
  219:         case X#exchange.rsp_file of
  220:             no_rsp_file -> ok;
  221:             Filename ->
  222:                 Filepath = Filesdir ++ Filename,
  223:                 io:format("Reading facit file ~s~n", [Filepath]),
  224:                 {ok, Facit} = file:read_file(Filepath),
  225:                 io:format("About to compare facit [~s]~n with response body [~s]~n", [Facit, Body]),
  226:                 case X#exchange.entity_compare of
  227:                   strict -> Facit = Body;
  228:                   trimmed -> trim_compare(Facit, Body)
  229:                 end
  230:         end
  231:     end, Exchanges).
  232: 
  233: trim_compare(Bin1, Bin2) when is_binary(Bin1) ->
  234:   trim_compare(binary_to_list(Bin1), Bin2);
  235: trim_compare(Str1, Bin2) when is_binary(Bin2) ->
  236:   trim_compare(Str1, binary_to_list(Bin2));
  237: trim_compare(Str1, Str2) ->
  238:   S1 = string:trim(Str1),
  239:   S2 = string:trim(Str2),
  240:   S1 = S2.
  241: 
  242: catch_forward(Config) ->
  243:   run_test(#exchange{
  244:     url = "http://localhost:1029/helloworld.html",
  245:     rsp_headers = [
  246:         {"content-type", "text/html"}
  247:     ],
  248:     rsp_file = "facit.html"
  249:   }, Config).
  250: 
  251: static_get_rootfile(Config) ->
  252:     run_test(#exchange{
  253:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/rootfile.html",
  254:                 rsp_headers = [
  255:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  256:                 ],
  257:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  258:             },
  259:             Config).
  260: 
  261: static_get_subfile(Config) ->
  262:     run_test(#exchange{
  263:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder/subfile.html",
  264:                 rsp_headers = [
  265:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  266:                 ],
  267:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  268:             },
  269:             Config).
  270: 
  271: static_index_txt_welcome(Config) ->
  272:     run_test(#exchange{
  273:               url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolderwithtextindex/",
  274:               rsp_headers = [
  275:                   {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  276:               ],
  277:               rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  278:             },
  279:             Config).
  280: 
  281: static_get_rootindex(Config) ->
  282:   run_test(#exchange{
  283:             url = "http://localhost:1031/",
  284:             rsp_headers = [
  285:                 {"content-type", "text/html"}
  286:             ],
  287:             rsp_file = "facit.html"
  288:           },
  289:           Config).
  290: 
  291: static_get_subindex(Config) ->
  292:   run_test(#exchange{
  293:           url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder",
  294:           rsp_headers = [
  295:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  296:           ],
  297:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  298:         },
  299:         Config).
  300: 
  301: staticlisting_list_root(Config) ->
  302:   run_test(#exchange{
  303:           url = "http://localhost:1032/",
  304:           rsp_headers = [
  305:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  306:           ],
  307:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  308:           entity_compare = trimmed
  309:         },
  310:         Config).
  311: 
  312: staticlisting_list_sub(Config) ->
  313:   run_test(#exchange{
  314:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/",
  315:           rsp_headers = [
  316:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  317:           ],
  318:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  319:           entity_compare = trimmed
  320:         },
  321:         Config).
  322: 
  323: staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile(Config) ->
  324:   run_test(#exchange{
  325:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/index.html",
  326:           rsp_headers = [
  327:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  328:           ],
  329:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  330:         },
  331:         Config).
  332: 
  333: xslpi_basic(Config) ->
  334:   run_test(#exchange{
  335:     url = "http://localhost:1030/docs/resource.xml",
  336:     rsp_headers = [
  337:       {"content-type", "text/xml"}
  338:     ],
  339:     rsp_file = "facit.xml"
  340:     },
  341:     Config).
  342: 
  343: accesslog_check_request_logged(Cfg) -> run_test([
  344:   #exchange{
  345:     url = "http://localhost:1028/helloworld.txt",
  346:     rsp_headers = [
  347:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  348:     ],
  349:     rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  350:   },
  351:   #exchange{
  352:     url = "http://localhost:1028/logs",
  353:     rsp_headers = [
  354:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  355:     ],
  356:     rsp_pattern = "^.*|GET /helloworld.txt| .* 200"
  357:     }
  358:   ], Cfg).
  359:   
  360:   
  361: move_file(Cfg) -> run_test([
  362:     #exchange{
  363:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  364:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  365:     },
  366:     #exchange{
  367:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  368:         status = 404
  369:     },
  370:     #exchange{
  371:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  372:         method = delete,
  373:         req_headers = [
  374:             {"destination", "newname"},
  375:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  376:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  377:         ],
  378:         rsp_headers = [
  379:             {"location", "newname"}
  380:         ]
  381:     },
  382:     #exchange{
  383:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  384:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  385:     },
  386:     #exchange{
  387:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  388:         status = 404
  389:     }], Cfg).
  390:     
  391: move_folder(Cfg) -> run_test([
  392:     #exchange{
  393:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  394:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  395:     },
  396:     #exchange{
  397:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  398:         status = 404
  399:     },
  400:     #exchange{
  401:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  402:         method = delete,
  403:         req_headers = [
  404:             {"destination", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"},
  405:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  406:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  407:         ],
  408:         rsp_headers = [
  409:             {"location", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"}
  410:         ]
  411:     },
  412:     #exchange{
  413:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  414:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  415:     },
  416:     #exchange{
  417:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  418:         status = 404
  419:     }], Cfg).
  420: 
  421: history_unparsable_body(Cfg) ->
  422:   run_test(
  423:     #exchange{
  424:       method = post,
  425:       url = "http://localhost:1033/unparsable.xml",
  426:       status = 400,
  427:       req_headers = [
  428:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  429:       ],
  430:       req_body = <<"[=root&\"=lite_text&]=annan_root">>
  431:     }
  432:   ,Cfg).
  433: 
  434: history_get_latest(Cfg) -> run_test([
  435:   #exchange{
  436:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  437:     method = post,
  438:     req_headers = [
  439:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  440:     ],
  441:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  442:   },
  443:   #exchange{
  444:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  445:     method = post,
  446:     req_headers = [
  447:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  448:     ],
  449:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  450:   },
  451:   #exchange{
  452:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  453:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  454:     entity_compare = trimmed
  455:   }
  456:   ], Cfg).
  457: 
  458: 
  459: history_get_earlier(Cfg) -> run_test([
  460:   #exchange{
  461:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  462:     method = post,
  463:     req_headers = [
  464:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  465:     ],
  466:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  467:   },
  468:   #exchange{
  469:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  470:     method = post,
  471:     req_headers = [
  472:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  473:     ],
  474:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  475:   },
  476:   #exchange{
  477:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml;rev=0",
  478:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>orangutang</apa></apor>",
  479:     entity_compare = trimmed
  480:   }
  481: ], Cfg).
  482: 
  483: history_expect_conflict(Cfg) -> run_test([
  484:   #exchange{
  485:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  486:     method = post,
  487:     req_headers = [
  488:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  489:     ],
  490:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  491:   },
  492:   #exchange{
  493:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  494:     method = post,
  495:     req_headers = [
  496:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  497:     ],
  498:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  499:   },
  500:   #exchange{
  501:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  502:     method = post,
  503:     req_headers = [
  504:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  505:     ],
  506:     status = 409,
  507:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=gorilla&]=apa&]=apor"
  508:   },
  509:   #exchange{
  510:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  511:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  512:     entity_compare = trimmed
  513:   }
  514: ], Cfg).
  515: 
  516: history_post_and_reread(Cfg) ->
  517:   run_test([
  518:     #exchange{
  519:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  520:       method = post,
  521:       req_headers = [
  522:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  523:       ],
  524:       req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  525:     },
  526:     #exchange{
  527:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  528:       rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  529:       entity_compare = trimmed
  530:     }
  531:   ], Cfg).
  532: 
  533: history_empty(Config) ->
  534:   run_test(#exchange{
  535:     url = "http://localhost:1033/finns_inte.xml",
  536:     status = 404
  537:   }, Config).
  538: 
  539: vhosts_basic(Cfg) ->
  540:   run_test([#exchange{
  541:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  542:         req_headers = [
  543:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  544:           {"host", "orangutang"}
  545:         ],
  546:         status = 200,
  547:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  548:   }, #exchange{
  549:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  550:         req_headers = [
  551:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  552:           {"host", "schimpans"}
  553:         ],
  554:         status = 200,
  555:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  556:   }], Cfg).
  557: 
  558:   vhosts_subdomains(Cfg) ->
  559:     run_test([#exchange{
  560:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  561:           req_headers = [
  562:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  563:             {"host", "orangutang.jenspersson.com"}
  564:           ],
  565:           status = 200,
  566:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  567:     }, #exchange{
  568:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  569:           req_headers = [
  570:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  571:             {"host", "schimpans.jenspersson.com"}
  572:           ],
  573:           status = 200,
  574:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  575:     }], Cfg).
  576:
